sheet_title: (E) Single-Fam. Res. Roof Plan w/ Demo
description: Existing single-family residence roof plan showing demolition scope. Two trellis structures (378.0 SQ.FT. total) at rear of property marked for demolition. Includes demolition notes and demo legend.
key_content: Demolition notes: relocate reusable materials, protect existing structure, brace/shore as required
Demo legend: building outline, roof outline, existing trellis to be demo
Designer: Oscar Sanchez, DBA / ADU West, C-8633
